page.title: 13Townland names
page.content: These are ancient townland names in our area together with their meanings. {Ballyrea}_This means the grey town. {Farmacaffly}_This means a farm in Caffly's land. {Ballyheridan}_This means Heridan's town. {Ballynahone}_This means a small town on a river. {Moneypatrick}_This means a break of rough ground and named after Patrick. {Lisbanae}_This means a house with a fort. {Enagh}_This means marshy land. {Killynure}_This means a church of the yew tree. {Gargagh}_This means poor rough land. {Ballyrath}_This means a town of a fort. {Ballytarran}_This means Tarran's land. {Rosebrook}_This means a brook and is
